backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining dialogue, activities, moments, letters, user profiles, and per-user game state with access-control mixin integration.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file listing implemented features, associated source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to concise functional summaries of each component or system.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide explaining how to diagnose and retry failed Internet Computer canister deployments.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles, theme variables, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React entrypoint and providing the root DOM container.
frontend/OPS_CANISTER_AVAILABILITY.md: Ops document describing how to keep the canister running and troubleshoot availability issues.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component managing screens, startup flow, backend availability checks, and game launch logic with diagnostics.
frontend/src/config/adminGate.ts: Configuration module defining the local admin username and derived storage key for admin access gating.
Defines activity data including trust effects and optional moment unlocks for in‑game interactions.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudio.ts: Manages audio settings with Zustand and provides background music playback with persistent volume and mute state.
frontend/src/game/characters/Puro.tsx: Renders the Puro character as a sprite with hover effects, idle animation, and dialogue interaction handling.
frontend/src/game/controls/MobileControl: Provides touch‑based joystick, look controls, and jump input for mobile devices, disabling controls when paused or terminal is open.
frontend/src/game/controls/usePlayerCont: Combines keyboard, joystick, and look inputs into unified movement and camera deltas while respecting pause and terminal states.
Zustand store holding joystick, look delta, and jump request state used by player control logic.
frontend/src/game/customization/customiz: Defines available customization items and their possible placement locations.
Contains dialogue tree nodes, choices, trust effects, and branching logic for conversations with Puro.
frontend/src/game/enemies/types.ts: Defines enemy state types and shared constants for movement, detection, and behavior settings.
frontend/src/game/enemies/WhiteLatexBeas: Implements an AI-driven enemy that wanders, ambushes, and chases the player using Three.js and a state machine.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Main game view component that initializes the game, renders the 3D canvas and HUD overlays, and manages pause state and scene switching.
frontend/src/game/letters/letterTemplate: Generates contextual letter responses based on keywords using predefined friendly, curious, and encouraging templates.
frontend/src/game/minigames/BookSortingM: A drag-and-drop style book categorization minigame that adjusts trust and reports completion.
frontend/src/game/minigames/DrawingMiniG: A drawing viewer minigame where viewing each drawing increases trust and completion rewards additional trust.
frontend/src/game/minigames/HideAndSeekM: A timed guessing miniggame where the player searches for Puro, with trust changes based on guesses and time remaining.
frontend/src/game/minigames/MiniGameLaun: Launches and navigates between available minigames with a simple menu and close handling.
frontend/src/game/moments/MomentPlayer.t: Displays a narrative moment with title, scene text, and a close button inside a modal-style card.
frontend/src/game/moments/momentsData.ts: Defines moment data entries including titles, scenes, and trust requirements for unlocking them.
frontend/src/game/scene/HiveScene.tsx: 3D hive scene handling player movement, jumping, enemy encounters, and transfur capture logic with procedural tree generation.
frontend/src/game/scene/LibraryScene.tsx: Library scene with player movement, jumping, camera control, Puro proximity detection, and wood texture loading.
frontend/src/game/state/useGameStore.ts: Zustand store managing game state, UI visibility, trust, activities, transfurs, scenes, and persistence.
frontend/src/game/state/useSettingsStore: Zustand store for player settings, currently storing and persisting aim sensitivity.
frontend/src/game/story/endings.ts: Defines ending data and selects an ending based on trust thresholds.
frontend/src/game/story/EndingScene.tsx: Component displaying the final ending based on trust and offering new‑game or title‑screen options.
frontend/src/game/ui/ActivityMenu.tsx: UI menu listing activities that modify trust, unlock moments, and close after selection.
Panel for placing discovered customization items in the library and viewing placed items.
frontend/src/game/ui/DialoguePanel.tsx: Dialogue UI that displays the current dialogue node, filters choices by trust level, and updates trust and dialogue state on selection.
frontend/src/game/ui/LettersPanel.tsx: Panel for writing letters and viewing inbox, sending messages with validation and generating delayed responses.
frontend/src/game/ui/MomentsMenu.tsx: Lists unlockable moments and allows playing unlocked ones through a dedicated player component.
frontend/src/game/ui/PauseMenu.tsx: Pause menu providing resume, navigation to various game sections, settings access, and optional admin terminal.
frontend/src/game/ui/SettingsScreen.tsx: Settings UI allowing audio controls and aim sensitivity adjustments with a back button.
frontend/src/game/ui/TransfurOverlay.tsx: Timed fade-in/out overlay showing a transfur message and calling a completion callback.
frontend/src/game/ui/TrustMeter.tsx: Displays trust level with label, color-coded icon, and progress bar.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendAvailabilit: Checks backend health using an actor with React Query and provides status, errors, and a refetch method.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading identities, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend game operations such as fetching state and performing mutations like starting games or making choices.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS layers and defines a warm color palette with light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/startup.ts: Handles one‑time startup tasks including asset preloading, storage checks, and maintaining initialization state.
frontend/src/state/useAdminGateStore.ts: Implements a persisted Zustand store providing a simple username-based local admin unlock gate.
Empty file placeholder for a future Zustand server access store.
frontend/src/ui/AdminAccessPanel.tsx: Renders a local admin access UI allowing unlock via username and displaying lock/unlock feedback.
frontend/src/ui/CreditsScreen.tsx: Displays the game's credits and about section with themed styling and a back button.
frontend/src/ui/DiagnosticTerminalOverla: Renders an admin‑gated diagnostic terminal overlay with input handling, auto‑scrolling, and command execution.
frontend/src/ui/GameLaunchErrorScreen.ts: Displays a launch failure screen summarizing errors with optional technical details and retry/back navigation.
frontend/src/ui/GameRuntimeErrorBoundary: Implements an error boundary that catches runtime errors during game rendering and shows a recovery UI with details.
frontend/src/ui/ServerStatusIndicator.ts: Shows a small status badge indicating backend server health based on availability state.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/commands.ts: Parses and executes a small set of terminal commands, including diagnostics and backend status checks.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalDiag: Formats diagnostic data into readable text lines for terminal display.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalStor: Zustand store managing terminal visibility, input/output lines, and state updates.
frontend/src/ui/TitleScreen.tsx: Renders the main title screen with game actions, admin tools, server status, and offline mode notices.
frontend/src/utils/launchErrorNormalizat: Provides a function to convert raw launch errors into categorized, user-friendly summaries for game startup actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/STARTUP.md: Documentation outlining the frontend startup sequence, responsibilities, and extension guidelines.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON file tracking project metadata, feature requirements, issues, and required image assets.
